title: Heat
cast: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Val Kilmer
plot: Criminals attempt a heist at shocking costs
review: I enjoyed the heist scenes. They were exciting.

title: Rushmore
cast: Jason Schwartzman, Bill Murray, Owen Wilson
plot: An ambitious high schooler takes on some new extra-curriculars.

title: The Score
cast: Robert De Niro, Marlon Brando, Ed Norton
plot: Criminals attempt a heist with risks even they do not fully understand.
review: The jazz club was cool. Love the scenes with De Niro hanging by a thread!
